svg.title: ðŸ§© Puzzle.SVG

g.text: You can be a wallpainting restorator!
In the middle you have the version we found with basic correction.
In the middle you have the version we found with basic correction.
With posting the puzzle pice in the right place you restart this wallpainting!
Please open in browser to play!
You have solved the puzzle in

textarea.placeholder: You can paste/drop any image here.

div.label:
Fixed pattern
(may be harder depends on the image)

svg.script: const lang = [{ "vid1": "Four centuries of castle history", "vid2": "Wallpaintings reloaded", "puzzlegame": "Play! Restoration puzzle", "interationgame": "Use your fantasy! Interpretation game", "gametopic": "You can also be a mural painting restorer!", "subtitle": "We have already made the first step in the restoration process,", "subtitle0": " and uncovered the remains of the 17th century wallpainting from beneath many layers of plaster.", "conclude": "Now it's your turn to complete the picture with the missing details.", "gametopic2": "It still seems like a lot of missing details?", "gametopic20": "Well, according to the Venice Charter for the Conservation and Restoration of Monuments,", "gametopic21": "restoration must be carried out with respect to the original, and must stop at the moment where conjecture begins.", "subtitle2": "But this doesn't stop us from making our well documented assumptions on how the originals most probably looked like.", "conclude2": "The next level of the puzzle will reveal it to you!", "success1": "Congratulations, your painting is now restored!", "success11" : "While restorers worked for months on the orignal, it only took you .... minutes", "success2": "Great work! Now you know how old wallpaitings are being restored.", "success21" : "During this process of restoration and historical researching,", "success22" : "we also found out a lot of interesting stories about the life of the Daniels.", "successs23" : "Visit the rest of the exhibition to discover them." }, { "vid1": "Castelul Daniel - 4 secole de istorie", "vid2": "Fresco reloaded", "puzzlegame": "JoacÄƒ-te de-a restauratorul!", "interationgame": "FoloseÈ™te-È›i imaginaÈ›ia!", "gametopic": "Devino È™i tu restaurator de picturi murale!", "subtitle": "Noi am fÄƒcut deja primele demersuri Ã®n minuÈ›iosul proces de restaurare,", "subtitle0": "È™i am Ã®ndepÄƒrtat stratul gros de tencuialÄƒ aplicat de-a lungul secolelor peste suprafeÈ›ele pictate din anii 1680.", "conclude": "Acum e rÃ¢ndul tÄƒu sÄƒ completezi imaginea.", "gametopic2": "ÃŽncÄƒ È›i se pare cÄƒ sunt multe detalii lipsÄƒ?", "gametopic20": "Potrivit Cartei de la VeneÈ›ia a ConservÄƒrii È™i RestaurÄƒrii Monumentelor Istorice,", "gametopic21": "restaurarea trebuie sÄƒ se bazeze pe respectul materialului original, È™i trebuie sÄƒ se opreascÄƒ acolo unde Ã®ncepe ipoteza.", "subtitle2": "Dar asta nu ne-a Ã®mpiedicat sÄƒ avem niÈ™te ipoteze bine documentate despre cum arÄƒtau originalele.", "conclude2": "PoÈ›i descoperi È™i tu, completÃ¢nd urmÄƒtorul nivel al puzzle-ului.", "success1": "FelicitÄƒri, ai reuÈ™it sÄƒ restaurezi fresca Ã®n doar .... minute!", "success11" : "SÄƒ È™tii cÄƒ restauratorii au migÄƒlit timp de mai multe luni pe originale.", "success2": "Bravo! Acum È™ti È™i tu cum se restaureazÄƒ o frescÄƒ.", "success21" : "Dealungul procesului de restaurare È™i de cercetare istoricÄƒ,", "success22" : "am descoperit multe poveÈ™ti interesante despre viaÈ›a Danielilor.", "success23" : "VziteazÄƒ expoziÈ›ia sÄƒ le descoperi È™i tu." }, { "vid1": "A Daniel-kastÃ©ly 4 Ã©vszÃ¡zada", "vid2": "FalkÃ©pek ÃºjratÃ¶ltve", "puzzlegame": "JÃ¡tsz restaurÃ¡lÃ³sdit!", "interationgame": "Vesd be a kÃ©pzelÅ‘erÅ‘d!", "gametopic": "LÃ©gy te is falfestmÃ©ny restaurÃ¡tor!", "subtitle": "Mi mÃ¡r elvÃ©geztÃ¼k a felÃºjÃ­tÃ¡si folyamat elsÅ‘ lÃ©pÃ©seit,", "subtitle0": "Ã©s a sok rÃ©teg vakolat alÃ³l, aprÃ³lÃ©kos munkÃ¡val feltÃ¡rtuk a 17. szÃ¡zadi falkÃ©p maradvÃ¡nyait.", "conclude": "Most rajtad a sor, retusÃ¡ld a kÃ©pet.", "gametopic2": "Ãšgy tÅ±nik, hogy mÃ©g mindig sok a hiÃ¡nyossÃ¡g?", "gametopic20": "A mÅ±emlÃ©kek konzervÃ¡lÃ¡sÃ¡ra Ã©s restaurÃ¡lÃ¡sÃ¡ra vonatkozÃ³ Velencei Charta elveit kÃ¶vetve,", "gametopic21": "a felÃºjÃ­tÃ¡s sorÃ¡n tiszteletben kell tartani az eredeti alkotÃ¡st, tÃ¶rtÃ©nelmi dokumentumok hiÃ¡nyÃ¡ban tilos az eredeti tÃ¡rgy Ãºjboli lÃ©trehozÃ¡sa.", "subtitle2": "De ez nem akadÃ¡lyozott meg abban, hogy korabeli dokumentumok analÃ³giÃ¡ja alapjÃ¡n megprÃ³bÃ¡ljuk elkÃ©pzelni, hogy milyenek lehettek az olaszteleki falfestmÃ©nyek eredeti pompÃ¡jukban.", "conclude2": " A kirakÃ³s kÃ¶vetkezÅ‘ szintjÃ©t megoldva te is megtudhatod.", "success1": "GratulÃ¡lunk, a falkÃ©ped restaurÃ¡lva van!", "success11" : "Mig az eredetin hÃ³napokig dolgoztak a restaurÃ¡torok, neked alig ..... percbe tellett.", "success2": "NagyszerÅ± munka! Most mÃ¡r te is tudod, hogyan restaurÃ¡ljÃ¡k a falfestmÃ©nyeket.", "success21" : "A felÃºjÃ­tÃ¡si folyamat rÃ©sze az alapos tÃ¶rtÃ©neti kutatÃ¡s is,", "success22" : " mely alatt sok Ã©rdekes tÃ¶rtÃ©netet fedeztÃ¼nk fel a Danielek Ã©letÃ©rÅ‘l.", "success23" : "NÃ©zd meg a kiÃ¡llÃ­tÃ¡s tÃ¶bbi rÃ©szÃ©t, iskerkedj meg velÃ¼k." }] var nodeLange = localStorage.getItem("langState") $(".comentTitle")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['gametopic'] $(".comentTitle1")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['subtitle'] $(".comentTitle10")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['subtitle0'] $(".comentTitle2")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['conclude'] console.log($("#success1")) $("#success1")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['success1'] $("#success11")[0].textContent = lang[nodeLange]['success11']
